About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Save Hands

An enthusiastic, driven and eager to learn 'nerdista'. With an eye for design and a passion for technology.
In addition, I have good communication skills, I easily make contact with people and pick things up quickly.
I am in my element when I can create beautiful things that make users happy.


Outside of my work activities I act as an ambassador of VHTO. An orginisation that wants to improve the image of women in tech so that young girls will be motivated to choose a carreer in that field.


In my spare time I like to game, dance and ride my motorcycle.

HBO Front-End Developer

A one year programme from the LOI. This is completely done from home.

Scrummaster I

The official Scrummaster I certificate from scrum.org.

ISTQB

Internationally recognised testing certificate. Issued by istqb.org.
